attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: by doing so,the lines could be then charged for their use by rail companies.Considerable work needs to be done so that a considerable amount of road traffic (i.e. heavy freight)be forced back onto the rails;thus reducing road traffic,pollution & accidents.A lot of the closed lines should be looked to be reopened,thus reducing passenger traffic by car & bus.Better road/rail interchange needs to be introduced.

rejection.details:
There are a number of live petitions that relate to your topic.
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/betterrailways/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/48BritishRail95/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/rail2k8/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
